title: Online Education Program for Strengthening Multidisciplinary Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational design theory and at least one year of practical experience
context.additional_context: Social Studies-Integrated Education Program for Office/Administrative Professionals, Designed to Acquire Multidisciplinary Design Approaches Through Project-Based Assessment in a BYOD Environment

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain design education methodologies across four interdisciplinary fields (business, engineering, humanities, environmental design).
Learners can execute real-world problem-solving projects integrating interdisciplinary design approaches.
Learners can communicate effectively with multidisciplinary team members using online collaboration tools.
Learners can establish criteria for evaluating design outcomes within a social context.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
